contribs-title:
Title for screen showing the user's uploaded media files.
{{Identical|My upload}}
contribs-settings-button:
Button text for opening settings screen. Should be short, sits on a toolbar.
{{Identical|Settings}}
contribs-upload-button:
Button text for starting a batch upload. Should be short, sits on a toolbar.
{{Identical|Upload}}
contribs-photo-library-button:
Button text for opening the device's photo library to import an image. Should be short, sits on a toolbar.
{{Identical|Photo}}
contribs-state-queued:
Label on not-yet-uploaded photo items in contributions list view.
{{Identical|Queue}}
contribs-state-uploading:
Label on currently-uploading photo items in contributions list view
{{Identical|Uploading}}
contribs-refresh: Label appearing on 'pull-to-refresh' area above upload scroller view
error-upload-failed:
Error message indicating that upload failed.
{{Identical|Upload failed}}
error-dismiss:
Button text for dismissing error alert.
{{Identical|Dismiss}}
error-nologin-title: Title for error dialog, informal is ok.
error-nologin-text: Detail text for error alert indicating you must log in before uploading.
error-bad-password-title:
Title for error dialog, informal is ok.
{{Identical|Login error}}
error-bad-password: Detail text for error alert indicating that username or password were incorrect while logging in
reltime-minutes:
Relative time to display on photos. Parameters:
* $1 - time in minutes. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
reltime-hours:
Relative time to display on photos. Parameters:
* $1 - time in hours. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
reltime-days:
Relative time to display on photos. Parameters:
* $1 - time in days. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
settings-title:
Title for screen where the user can input their account info and settings.
{{Identical|Settings}}
settings-username-placeholder:
Placeholder text for username field in settings.
{{Identical|Username}}
settings-password-placeholder:
Placeholder text for password field in settings.
{{Identical|Password}}
settings-debug-label: Label for debug mode switch in settings (switches between uploading to Commons and to a test site)
settings-debug-detail:
Label indicating which site photos will be uploaded to. Parameters:
* $1 - a domain name such as commons.wikimedia.org
details-upload-button:
Button text for button to begin uploading the selected photo.
{{Identical|Upload}}
details-title-label:
Label for title input/display field on photo details.
{{Identical|Title}}
details-title-placeholder: Placeholder text for title input field on photo details
details-description-label:
Label for description input/display field on photo details.
{{Identical|Description}}
details-description-placeholder:
Placeholder text for description input field on photo details.
{{Identical|Required}}
details-license-label:
Label for license selector/display field on photo details.
{{Identical|License}}
details-hide-keyboard: Button text for hiding the image description keyboard on the image Details page
web-open-in:
Button text for opening web page in a given browser. Parameters:
* $1 - the application name such as 'Safari' or 'Opera'
login-title: Title for the button that brings the user back to the login page. Note that PLURAL will be supported, but is not yet.
login-button: Button text for the login page's login button
about-title: Title for screen showing app name, version, credits and licenses
about-app-version-label: Label for showing the version of the app
about-commons-button: Button text for linking to Wikimedia Commons web page
about-bugs-button: Button text for linking to the app bug tracker web page
about-privacy-button: Button text for linking to the commons privacy policy web page
about-source-button: Button text for linking to the app source code web page
about-source-this-app-title: Title for source section for this app
about-source-this-app-contributors: Title for contributors link for this app
about-license-button: Title for license link for this app
about-source-gradient-title: Title for source section for the gradient button code
license-details-url: URL to local language mobile version of https://commons.m.wikimedia.org/wiki/Commons:Licensing
